arn.description: The ARN assigned by AWS for this Elastic Beanstalk Application.

name.description: The name of the application, must be unique within your account

tags.description: Key-value map of tags for the Elastic Beanstalk Application. If configured with a provider `default_tags` configuration block present, tags with matching keys will overwrite those defined at the provider-level.

tagsAll.description: A map of tags assigned to the resource, including those inherited from the provider `default_tags` configuration block.
